members.docComment:
/**
 * @description Associates actions with a given state change function. A state change function must be provided as the last parameter.
 *
 * @param args - `ActionCreator`'s followed by a state change function.
 *
 * @returns an association of action types with a state change function.
 *
 * @usageNotes
 * ```ts
 * on(AuthApiActions.loginSuccess, (state, { user }) => ({ ...state, user }))
 * ```
 *
 */

excerptTokens.text: export declare function on<State, Creators extends

<State extends infer S ? S : never, Creators, InferredState>
]

members.name: on

docs.summary: Associates actions with a given state change function. A state change function must be provided as the last parameter.
docs.returns: an association of action types with a state change function.

params.name: args
params.description: `ActionCreator`'s followed by a state change function.
